name: Performapal Gold Fang
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: All "Performapal" monsters you currently control gain 200 ATK until the end of this turn.
pend_desc: Once per turn, if your "Performapal" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
monster_desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: All "Performapal" monsters you currently control gain 200 ATK until the end of this turn.
